items.sentence: I think that Mary is more beautiful than Alice.
Tom is a lot better at doing that than Mary is.
Tom is about to get married for the third time.
Tom is actually on his way to Boston right now.
Tom is almost always free in the early evening.
Tom is always complaining about what Mary does.
I forwarded the message I got from Tom to Mary.
I always stay at their house when I\'m in town.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t really angry at him.
Tom knows that Mary doesn\'t know how to drive.
I don\'t want to tell Tom I\'ve been to Boston.
You were dying, but the doctor saved your life.
You were friends with both Tom and Mary, right?
He was looking forward to that evening\'s date.
I didn\'t tell Tom that I grew up in Australia.
I didn\'t think Tom would ask Mary to help him.
I don\'t really want anything to eat right now.
I promise I\'ll mop the floor tomorrow morning.
I promise you I won\'t do anything to harm you.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom hadn\'t yet done that.
